front.title: A Taxonomy of Grouping Semantics and Mechanisms for Real-Time Transport Protocol (RTP) Sources

abstract.t: The terminology about, and associations among, Real-Time Transport Protocol (RTP) sources can be complex and somewhat opaque. This document describes a number of existing and proposed relationships among RTP sources, and attempts to define common terminology for discussing protocol entities and their relationships. This document is still very rough, but is submitted in the hopes of making future discussion productive.
